name: mvp-roc
description: ROC Passaporte - MVP Backend e Frontend

scripts.dev: npx concurrently -k -s first -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
